documentation.text: @dev Emitted when the donation of `value` received from `account`.

@dev This function is called for all messages sent to
 this contract, except plain Ether transfers
 (there is no other function except the receive function).
 Any call with non-empty calldata to this contract will execute
 the fallback function (even if Ether is sent along with the call).

@dev This function is called for plain Ether transfers, i.e.
 for every call with empty calldata.
@dev Emitted when the donation of `value` received from `account`.

@dev This function is called for all messages sent to
 this contract, except plain Ether transfers
 (there is no other function except the receive function).
 Any call with non-empty calldata to this contract will execute
 the fallback function (even if Ether is sent along with the call).

@dev This function is called for plain Ether transfers, i.e.
 for every call with empty calldata.

Donated(address,uint256).details: Emitted when the donation of `value` received from `account`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
